attributes.title: I got this app and suddenly I lost all of my rights???
attributes.review: I downloaded this app, but suddenly I lost the ability to get contraceptives, have easy access to an abortion, and survive a pandemic! My friends had even worse outcomes, some of them can’t live their lives without being harassed by the police or can’t leave dangerous situations in their home countries to come here!

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: I tried to download the app but it took 3 whole days and then crashed my phone and I had to get a new one. I tried to complain about it but then my phone crashed for a week and when I went to the apple store the person said I got a virus but I didn’t remember downloading any virus other than this app. Stay safe and don’t get this app!!!!

attributes.title: i was so excited
attributes.review: i was so excited to get this app but it turns out that it has a virus that made my phone grow legs and it started vigorously beating my mom 😰 then after it hacked my phone and started sending numerous racial slurs to all of my friends!!!! i no longer have any friends and i have been outted on all social media’s 😡 this is an outrageous app and i will NOT stand for this!!

attributes.title: Don’t get this app!
attributes.review: While I was getting this app it was taking hours and like a day to fully download. It then also asked for my number so I put it in and I was getting really scary texts about oler people trying to make me tell them what my address was😭 but I didn’t because I wanted to be safe. If i could give this a negative 5 star review I would. 🤮

attributes.title: Awful!
attributes.review: I tried downloading this but it failed 3 TIMES!! Extremely laggy and not well made. Not recommended to anyone since after I downloaded this my entire phone started lagging and heating up. The next day my phone was on fire because the battery was too hot and couldn't handle this app since its so bad 😡😡😡 horrible app take this down!! - Margaret, Jenna, Karen.

attributes.title: WHAT THE HELL
attributes.review: downloaded this to support america’s president (TRUMP 2020🇲🇾🇲🇾) i entered my phone number and email & immediately received spams and notifications of my location being tracked! 😡(very disappointing.) i was going to vote for donald but i have decided not to after this horrific app. if he cannot control an app he cannot control a country. thank you for your time. #tuckfrump

attributes.title: Did not warn me!
attributes.review: I first downloaded this app so I could find the Trump rallies nearby. However, the app never reminded me that I needed to walk my pet butterfly. She’s really pretty and green. After that, I had to go swimming with her, and then teach her numbers like oppressed. 1 ⭐️ would not recommend because it did not notify me and I needed to cancel. This happened to many of my other friends.

attributes.title: STAY CLEAR OF THIS APP
attributes.review: 🥺 took an entire week to download this app 🤦🏻‍♀️ and once i finally opened it my phone overheated and would NOT turn back on. 😳had to buy a whole new phone. ✨📲 then i started getting really random phone calls from numerous numbers trying to ask my to redownload the app. 🙄🥴 i don’t think this is the best campaigning tactic. gonna vote for biden. 😤💜🥰

attributes.title: Good way to know where president is campaigning
attributes.review: Want to know when/where Trump is going to be near my town so that I can go and see him in person

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.review: worst app ever!! it was created by china to steal all my personal information!! it’s such a danger to society! some big cheeto puff runs it😳😳! cheeto puff rly tried it! let’s hope he never said does it agian🧚🏻‍♂️✨💕! the app stole all my information and killed my grandma! don’t buy!! falafel advertisement told me i could watch this great christan movie 365 days✨ but instead made me listen to a white supermisit! don’t get!!
